analysis.description:
Pinakion.balances (/unique_chucks/25/0xbaf2eb5ef3b3f71a49b971bb125b7ed2ccdad297.sol#249-251) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/25/0xbaf2eb5ef3b3f71a49b971bb125b7ed2ccdad297.sol#348-384)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/25/0xbaf2eb5ef3b3f71a49b971bb125b7ed2ccdad297.sol#455-477)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/25/0xbaf2eb5ef3b3f71a49b971bb125b7ed2ccdad297.sol#548-563)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/25/0xbaf2eb5ef3b3f71a49b971bb125b7ed2ccdad297.sol#571-585)
Pinakion.isContract (/unique_chucks/25/0xbaf2eb5ef3b3f71a49b971bb125b7ed2ccdad297.sol#648-657) is declared view but contains assembly code

BlockHashRNGFallback.saveRN (/unique_chucks/25/0xbaf2eb5ef3b3f71a49b971bb125b7ed2ccdad297.sol#841-856) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- _block < block.number && randomNumber[_block] == 0

Reentrancy in Kleros.passPeriod (/unique_chucks/25/0xbaf2eb5ef3b3f71a49b971bb125b7ed2ccdad297.sol#1204-1221):
	External calls:
	- rng.requestRN(rnBlock) (/unique_chucks/25/0xbaf2eb5ef3b3f71a49b971bb125b7ed2ccdad297.sol#1208)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- period (/unique_chucks/25/0xbaf2eb5ef3b3f71a49b971bb125b7ed2ccdad297.sol#1208)

	State variables written after the call(s):

Pinakion.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/25/0xbaf2eb5ef3b3f71a49b971bb125b7ed2ccdad297.sol#679-695) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_chucks/25/0xbaf2eb5ef3b3f71a49b971bb125b7ed2ccdad297.sol#693)

Pinakion.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/25/0xbaf2eb5ef3b3f71a49b971bb125b7ed2ccdad297.sol#615) shadows:
